message: RT @troyhunt: Just blogged: The eBay breach: answers to the questions that will inevitably be asked http://t.co/gsU7SoahJK
name: Troy Hunt: The eBay breach: answers to the questions that will inevitably be asked
caption: www.troyhunt.com
description: Here’s how it usually works: someone big gets hacked or a serious risk gets disclosed then all sorts of articles pop up with journos quoting people like myself on all the same questions that inevitably get asked. I’ve been doing a bit of that today in the wake of the eBay attack so I thought that ra…
